attributes.action: EU Referendum As Soon As Possible (including question)
attributes.additional_details:
The British people finally deserve a say on EU Membership if they are for or against. This is democracy and it is a disgrace we have not been given a say for over forty years. We should all be given a chance to vote for or against. If the main political parties support membership then tell us why and convince us.

We propose an in/out referendum on EU Membership should take place as soon as possible and the following question should be used:

The United Kingdom should leave the European Union- Yes or No
